name: Backyard Sports: Baseball 2007
description: Create your own team, and control every wacky pitch, clutch hit, and sprint for home. With players like Alex 'A-Rod' Rodriguez, secret pros to unlock and amazing power-ups, kids can play big-league ball right in their own backyard. An all-star MLB lineup: Carlos Delgado, Alfonso Soriano, Nomar Garciaparra, Alex Rodriguez, Ichiro, Albert Pujols, Eric Gagne, Pedro Martinez, Ivan Rodriguez and Vladamir Guerrero.
